text:
>2-
SHOT 5.
Uniform, repeatable pages coming off
press. Photos of book store, super market,
parking lot.
SHOT 6.
Students in study reading print swiftly,
silently. Heading on one plane at a time
v.8. oral depth reading. Multi-levelled
exegesis.
« SPLIT SCREEN CONTRAST WITH ~
SROT 7*
MSS reader struggling aloud to decipher.
Photo of Each, at lecfcum (also tape ree.)„
SHOT 8,
Modem analogue - teacher labouring with
pile of handwritten essays* struggling to
decipher aloud.
SHOT 9,
Letter reader asking help of friend to
decipher writing. When friend helps, turns
out to be a very simple phrase, recognizable
when read aloud.
SHOT 10.
Modem analogue of MSS with sound tape as
difficulty of access and reference. (Point
is people memorized MSS, but not print).
